meaningMnemonic: If you want to find some <kanji>coarse</kanji> <kanji>salt</kanji> just dive in the sea and collect <vocabulary>sea salt</vocabulary>! The pieces are nice and big and lumpy, so you really taste it when you're cooking.
readingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You've learned both of these readings by now so you should be able to read this on your own.
